title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\EducationFilter
name: EducationFilter
description:
Education filter of the search.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EducationFilter

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.school
params.description: The school name. For example "MIT", "University of California, Berkeley".

params.name: data.field_of_study
params.description: The field of study. This is to search against value provided in [Degree.fields_of_study][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Degree.fields_of_study]. For example "Computer Science", "Mathematics".

params.name: data.degree_type
params.description: Education degree in ISCED code. Each value in degree covers a specific level of education, without any expansion to upper nor lower levels of education degree.

params.name: data.negated
params.description: Whether to apply negation to the filter so profiles matching the filter is excluded.
